name: slacknews
description: Daily news aggregator using Gemini AI and Slack

scripts.deploy:news-collector: zip -r news-collector.zip src/lambdas/news-collector.js && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name SlackNews-NewsCollector --zip-file fileb://news-collector.zip
scripts.deploy:slack-sender: zip -r slack-sender.zip src/lambdas/slack-sender.js && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name SlackNews-SlackSender --zip-file fileb://slack-sender.zip
